name: ovnxrcl
params: class c0, class c1, wff w0

stmt.origin: sseldi(cfv(cfv(covoln, c0), c1), cxr, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf), w0)

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(cfv(cfv(covoln, c0), c1), cxr))
-| wss(co(nat0, cicc, cpnf), cxr)
-| wi(w0, wcel(cfv(cfv(covoln, c0), c1), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(cfv(cfv(covoln, c0), c1), cxr))
-| wss(co(nat0, cicc, cpnf), cxr)
-| wi(w0, wcel(cfv(cfv(covoln, c0), c1), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))

|- wi(w0, wcel(cfv(cfv(covoln, c0), c1), cxr))
-| wi(w0, wcel(cfv(cfv(covoln, c0), c1), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(cfv(cfv(covoln, c0), c1), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cfn))
-| wi(w0, wss(c1, co(cr, cmap, c0)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(cfv(cfv(covoln, c0), c1), cxr))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cfn))
-| wi(w0, wss(c1, co(cr, cmap, c0)))

comment: The Lebesgue outer measure of a set is an extended real. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Oct-2020.)
